channel.title: How to .jar a hyperion client?
channel.description: title says all.. the client has cache included. but when i use .jarmaker and put the manifest client. the client opens but dosent load? EDIT: if i put the .jar in the "bin" folder it loads.. how do i make it load from cache in c/:?

item.title: How to .jar a hyperion client?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

is there a signlink? the directory it loads from has to be specific somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: How to .jar a hyperion client?
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

title says all… the client has cache included. but when i use .jarmaker and put the manifest client.
the client opens but dosent load?
EDIT:
if i put the .jar in the “bin” folder it loads… how do i make it load from cache in c/:?
